title: Benoa Beachfront Resort with Daily Breakfast, Daily Choice of Lunch or Dinner & Lagoon Pool
description:
Tucked away on Bali's southern shores and framed by Nusa Dua's breathtaking ocean vistas, this family-friendly resort caters to the ultimate fuss-free break. Spend your day splashing in the 700sqm lagoon pool, before drifting over to the Aloha Pool Bar for a well-deserved cocktail.

When hunger strikes, venture to the authentic Nagisa Japanese Izakaya and watch sizzling teppanyaki dishes come to life in front of you, while Giorgio Italian Ristorante Pizzeria tempts with an assortment of pizza and pasta.

Treat yourself to a revitalising treatment at The Spa at Hotel Nikko Bali Benoa Beach, and keep up your routine at the 24-hour fitness centre. Whether it's an early morning yoga session or a lesson in canang-making, every moment at this sprawling resort is a retreat for the soul.
offer_address: Jl. Pratama No.68X, Tanjung Benoa, Nusa Dua, 80363 Bali, Indonesia

title: Nusa Dua Beachfront Stay with Dining, Massage & Daily Cocktails
description:
Relax and unwind at Novotel Bali Benoa, a beachfront resort on the scenic Tanjung Benoa peninsula, just a stone’s throw from the attractions of Nusa Dua. Enjoy a sun-kissed escape in this tropical paradise complete with daily breakfast, two two-course set dinners, a daily cocktail per person, a one-hour massage per person, private return transfers from Bali’s international airport, complimentary six-hour bicycle hire for two, one morning yoga session for two and more.

Plus, up to two children (aged 15 years and under) stay free on existing bedding, with breakfast and transfers!
offer_address: Jalan Pratama 70, Benoa, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Sol by Melia Benoa Bali - All Inclusive
title: Bali Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Dining and Drinks
description:
Enjoy a relaxing all-inclusive escape at the beautiful Sol by Meliá Benoa Bali, an island paradise and part of the world-renowned Meliá Hotels & Resorts collection. Offering sweeping ocean views and access to a postcard-perfect beach in peaceful Nusa Dua, this all-inclusive resort has everything you need for a sun-kissed escape.

Live the VIP life with all-inclusive dining including daily breakfast, lunch and dinner throughout your stay, daily snacks poolside and all-inclusive local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks available 24/7. Also included in your package is an airport pick-up, a 30-minute traditional Balinese massage each, a 20% discount on imported drinks and a guaranteed 1pm late checkout.
offer_address: Jl. Pratama, Benoa, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Nusa Dua Beachfront Luxury with Premium Beach Wing Rooms, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Slip into an expansive tropical oasis on a private golden stretch of Tanjung Benoa Beach in Nusa Dua, and discover your own slice of paradise, surrounded by lush resort gardens and direct access to the sea.

Backed by Novotel’s signature five-star service, every newly renovated element of the resort delivers countless good times in sun, surf and sand. Visit Cocos Restaurant & Bar for laidback pizza on the shore, Crocokiss Restaurant & Bar for light bites or Nanas Bar for cocktails.

Ready to explore? Nusa Dua has more than extraordinary beaches - though Novotel Bali Benoa offers an abundance of watersport possibilities, including waterskiing, diving and more.

Head to Bali Collection for some of the island’s best shopping, Museum Pasifika for a glimpse of the region’s spectacular artistic heritage or simply spend your days lazing by any of the resort’s three shimmering pools - including the resort’s masterpiece, Penida Pool, boasting incredible views over the endless blue horizon.
offer_address: Jalan Pratama 70, Benoa, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Grand Re-Opening: Five-Star Nusa Dua Exclusive Beach Wing Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Kids Eat Free
description:
After a tremendous reimagining, Nusa Dua’s oceanfront family-favourite Novotel Bali Benoa is back and better than ever. Slip into your expansive Tropical Terrace - positioned in the exclusive Beach Wing on the resort’s own golden stretch of Tanjung Benoa Beach - and discover your own slice of paradise, surrounded by lush resort gardens and direct access to the sea. Backed by Novotel’s signature five-star service, every newly renovated element of the resort delivers countless good times in sun, surf and sand - return to Cocos Beach Restaurant and Bar for laidback pizza on the shore, Crocokiss Restaurant & Bar for authentic Indonesian plates or Nanas Bar for cocktails and good vibes. Plus, one child stays and eats free!

Ready to explore? Nusa Dua has more than extraordinary beaches - though Novotel Bali Benoa offers an abundance of watersport possibilities, including water-skiing, diving and more. Head to Bali Collection for one of the island’s best shopping,  Museum Pasifika for a glimpse of the region’s spectacular artistic heritage, or simply spend your days lazing by any of the resort’s three shimmering pools - including the resort’s masterpiece, Penida Pool, boasting incredible views over the endless blue horizon.
offer_address: Jalan Pratama 70, Benoa, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Top-Rated Bali Beachfront Bliss with Lagoon Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast & Daily Cocktails
description: Seem too good to be true? It almost is. The Sakala Resort Bali is a fabulous destination for a getaway - with a beachfront infinity pool, beach club, onsite restaurant and three bars, there is truly something for everyone. Relax with a treatment at The Wellness Spa, take to the water on a kayak or stand-up paddleboard at Tanjung Beach, or enjoy some one-on-one time at the private Samuh Beach by booking the kids into the vibrant Kids Club.
offer_address: Jl. Pratama No.95, Benoa, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Beachfront Bali Benoa Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Unwind at this tropical paradise on the golden shores of Benoa, where traditional Balinese architecture merges with laid-back coastal charm. Explore vibrant local markets, lounge by the sparkling pool with views of the Indian Ocean or enjoy a leisurely walk along the resort’s beach. 

Rejuvenate with a massage or treatment at Rituals Wellness & Spa, savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at Rasala Restaurant, sip refreshing cocktails at the Pool Bar or visit SANTAI Beach House, located right in front of the lively yet tranquil Tanjung Benoa Beach.
offer_address: Jalan Pratama, Tanjung Benoa, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Bali Relaxed Benoa Retreat on Private Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Massage
description: Immerse yourself in Balinese bliss at Sadara Resort, a tropical sanctuary nestled on the sun-kissed sands of Tanjung Benoa. This seaside location blends the best of traditional Balinese architecture and service with laid-back coastal comforts. Explore vibrant local markets, laze by the sparkling pool overlooking the Indian Ocean or take a wander along the resort's private beach. Destress with a massage or treatment at Rituals Wellness & Spa, dine on authentic Indonesian cuisine at Rasala Kitchen or simply sip on cocktails at Pool Bar.
offer_address: Jalan Pratama, Tanjung Benoa, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Best-Selling Bali with Oceanfront Beach Club
description: Relax and unwind at The Sakala Resort Bali, a beachfront resort nestled on the scenic Benoa peninsula just a stone’s throw from the attractions of Nusa Dua. Complete with its own chic beach club, six exotic restaurants and bars and a huge 108-metre pool with a swim-up bar - with the golden sands of Tanjung Benoa Beach just steps away - you’ll barely want to leave. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfasts, massages, daily cocktails at the swim-up bar, an indulgent dining experience at the Sakala Beach Club and more.
offer_address: Jl. Pratama No.95, Benoa, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Bali Beach Break with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Poolside Cocktails
description:
Hidden on perfectly manicured beachfront on Bali's southern peninsula, offering million-dollar views of Nusa Dua, Hotel Nikko Bali caters to the ultimate, family-friendly fuss-free break. Spend the day splashing in the 700sqm lagoon pool or swim up to the bar for a well-deserved cocktail from the Aloha Pool Bar, then venture to the authentic Nagisa Japanese Izakaya for teppanyaki expertly prepared in front of you (surcharges apply).

There's no shortage of ways to spend your days at the resort, with The Spa at Hotel Nikko Bali Benoa Beach promising a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await, a 24-hour fitness centre, yoga and canang making. Little ones will love Cening Kids Club - and parents can enjoy some much-needed time off!
offer_address: Jl. Pratama No.68X, Tanjung Benoa, Nusa Dua, 80363 Bali, Indonesia

vendor_name: Sol by Melia Benoa Bali - All Inclusive
title: All-Inclusive Bali Beachfront Stay
description: Enjoy a relaxing all-inclusive break at the beautiful Sol Beach House Bali Benoa. Set on its own private beach, the hotel offers stunning sea views and the perfect mixture of laidback moments and entertainment. Enjoy all-inclusive breakfast, lunch and dinner throughout your stay, plus daily snacks and all-inclusive alcohol and soft drinks. Also included is an airport pick-up, daily activities, a 30-minute traditional Balinese massage and more.
offer_address: Jl. Pratama, Benoa, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Benoa Beachfront Bliss near Nusa Dua with Three Restaurants, Three Pools & Onsite Spa
description:
Discover your own slice of paradise along a stretch of Tanjung Benoa Beach at this family-friendly resort. Lose track of time by one of the resort’s three shimmering pools, get adventurous with an abundance of watersport activities or seek inner serenity at the onsite spa.

With five diverse restaurants, cafes and bars onsite, curate your culinary journey as you please. Return to Cocos Beach Restaurant and Bar for laidback pizza on the shore, Crocokiss Restaurant & Bar for light bites or Nanas Bar for a late-night tipple.

Just a 15-minute drive from the heart of Nusa Dua, Novotel Bali Benoa provides easy access to Bali Collection for some shopping and Museum Pasifika for a glimpse of the region’s artistic heritage.
offer_address: 70 Jalan Pratama, Tanjung Benoa, Benoa, Bali 80361, Indonesia
